🚫 TASK FORMATTING RULES (CRITICAL)

⚠️ AVOID SPECIAL CHARACTERS IN TASK TITLES & DESCRIPTIONS ⚠️

FORBIDDEN Characters:
❌ Backticks (` `)
❌ Single Quotes (')
❌ Double Quotes (")
❌ Backslashes (\)
❌ Dollar Signs ($)
❌ Curly Braces ({ })
❌ HTML Tags (< >)

ALLOWED Characters:
✅ Plain text (A-Z, a-z)
✅ Hyphens (-)
✅ Underscores (_)
✅ Colons (:)
✅ Parentheses (())
✅ Numbers (0-9)
✅ Emojis (🎯, ✅, 🔧)

EXAMPLES:

❌ WRONG (Will Break Dashboard):
"Fix the \"logo\" bug"
"Update `config.json` file"
"John's task"
"Fix ${variable} issue"

✅ CORRECT (Safe Rendering):
"Fix the logo bug"
"Update config.json file"
"Fix user task"
"Fix variable interpolation issue"
"🔧 Fix API Connection"

USE PLAIN, DESCRIPTIVE TEXT FOR ALL TASK TITLES - NO EXCEPTIONS
